Title: Midnight
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Carlton Cuse, Kerry Ehrin, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Bill Balas (staff writer)

Plot: With Jake Abernathy expecting her to meet him at midnight with the $150,000 Norma goes to Sheriff Romero for help. He assures her that he will take care of it and that she has nothing to ...
